thought: I will implement the parameters for the folder search action to find the specific folder by its name using the 'name' search method.
plan: Set searchMethod to 'name' to search by folder name.
Set queryString to 'ProAgentWorkspace/newsapi_data/2025-11-11' for the folder name.
Set returnAll to false and limit to 1 to get only one folder result.
criticism: The folder name might not be unique, but we assume it is unique for this use case.

tool_input.comments: Search the folder named 'ProAgentWorkspace/newsapi_data/2025-11-11' in Google Drive by folder name.
